name: .MBWB
summary: Learn about .MBWB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an MBWB with Mine Blocks (Web, Windows). To do so:
Select Backup from the world selection screen.
Navigate to and open your MBWB file.
Choose whether to add, skip, or replace duplicate worlds.
Choose whether to replace your current settings.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mbwb file in Zanzlanz Mine Blocks
images.caption: MBWB file open in Zanzlanz Mine Blocks
